name: Ghost Revenge (Rice Fry)
description:
How to play

Move: W,A,S,D

Jump: Space

Shoot: J

Joined, Get out: E

Reset level: R

The game make by Duc Anh with Unity Engine

A lost soul what to take revenge on all the black suit guys. So your mission is joined into their's body and take control and bring them to the death. Finally, be careful you must not die in they's body.

Now it just only 10 levels because of the time limited, I will try to expand more level later after GMTK end.

Thank you for playing and hope you guys enjoy it!!
